name: Minesweeper
description: Remember the classic Minesweeper? Is a logic puzzle video game generally played on Windows personal computers. The game features a grid of clickable tiles, with hidden mines scattered throughout. Your goal is to uncover all the safe tiles without triggering a mine. The more you clear, the closer you get to victory, but one wrong click could end it all. Can you clear the grid and avoid the explosions? Let's find out!
